OOC: Oh, and I don't hate organics, but during the G1 series, I think
the Decepticons gave us enough proof that they hated organics, so I'm
just playing my characters. Oh, and whatever you pull, it to little to
late, as you've pretty much commited suicide by Infultrating Decepticon
base :)
